Body:
"""Test that we can generate benchmarks for all supported MD engines w/o module validation."""
with tmpdir.as_cwd():
    for ext in extensions:
        open('protein.{}'.format(ext), 'a').close()
    result = cli_runner.invoke(cli, ['generate', '--module={}'.format(
        module), '--host=draco', '--max-nodes=4', '--gpu', '--no-cpu',
        '--name=protein', '--yes'])
    output = generate_output().format(module)
    output = (
        """WARNING Cannot locate modules available on this host. Not performing module name validation.
"""
         + output)
    if 'namd' in module:
        output = NAMD_WARNING_FORMATTED + output
    assert result.exit_code == 0
    assert result.output == output
pytest.mark.parametrize('module, extensions', [('gromacs/2016', ['tpr']), (
    'namd/11', ['namd', 'pdb', 'psf'])])
